name: Yun Jin & Friends
description:
Help out Yun Jin, Yae Miko and Shenhe on their quest for...... something, you'll have to find that out!

R to restart level                  Esc to return to main menu

Wait a bit for it to load, ok, we aren't perfect :sadge:

By Enegue and King Bob

Music from Dova Syndrome

Yun Jin, Shenhe and Yae Miko from Jenshin Impact
